item.title: Crowsville
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs LLC)
item.description: What is crowsville? An mmorpg 2d topdown farming simulator Why? I wanted an multiplatform game I can share adventures with my daughters. When? Not sure yet Currently looking for a game developer who I can partner with to write this. The online server portion has been written but I would love to start developing the game with a partner I can grow the title woth from the ground up
